titleStmt.title: Klētoi tetērēmēnoi, or, The Saints perseverance asserted in its positive grounds and vindicated from all material exceptions against it occasioned by a late immodest account of two conferences upon that point, between Tho. Danson and Mr. Jer. Ives, published by the said Mr. Ives, which account is also herein rectified, and its falshood detected to the just shame of the publisher / by Tho. Danson.
titleStmt.author: Danson, Thomas, d. 1694.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
